epd_metadata.address: 8700 W Bryn Mawr Ave, Chicago, IL 60631

product_description.product_definition: Portland cement is defined as a hydraulic cement produced by pulverizing clinker, consisting essentially of crystalline hydraulic calcium silicates, and usually containing one or more of the following: water, calcium sulfate, up to 5% limestone, and processing additions.

excluded_items: Production, manufacture, and construction of manufacturing capital goods and infrastructure
Production and manufacture of production equipment, delivery vehicles, and laboratory equipment
Personnel-related activities (travel, furniture, and office supplies)
Energy and water use related to company management and sales activities
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: All input/output data required were collected and included in the LCI modelling. No substances with hazardous and toxic properties that pose a concern for human health and/or the environment were identified.
lca_information.data_collection: Gate-to-gate input/output flow data were collected for limestone quarry, clinker production and cement manufacture for the reference year 2019.
lca_information.allocation_rules: Recycling and recycled content are modeled using the cut-off rule.

data_quality_requirements.technology_coverage: The Alpena, MI plant utilizes a long dry kiln technology.
data_quality_requirements.completeness: All relevant, specific processes were considered and modeled.
data_quality_requirements.consistency: Crosschecks concerning the plausibility of mass and energy flows were continuously conducted.
data_quality_requirements.reproducibility: Internal reproducibility is possible since the data and the models are stored and available in LH Alpena Athena LCI database.
data_quality_requirements.transparency: Activity and LCI datasets are disclosed in the project report.

additional_info.environmental_protection_and_equipment: Holcim manufacturing facilities comply with the U.S. environmental protection agency (EPA) regulations, monitor and report the emissions to air during the manufacturing process.
additional_info.air_pollution_abatement_equipment: High and low temperature baghouses, cartridge filters, drum filters, dry filters, bin vents, selective non-catalytic reduction (SNCR), wet scrubbers and dry scrubber (dry sorbent injection, DS).
